name: patientAppointment/getTimeSlots
description: This call will provide physician's available time slots for booking appointment.

parameters.name: physicianId
parameters.description: Time slot for physician. Use '/getProvidersList' to get physician id.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: Get time slots from.Should be greater or equal to current date. Format : YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: Get time slots up to. Format : YYYY-MM-DD
